5.To see the notable performance shift compared to the recent past, on the left hand side click on Change Points.

6.Change Points are higlighted as shown in below image. Click on the Triangle to get more information about the detected change point.

7.Details about the change point.

8.You can navigate to the request using Display Requests button.

Additional Information

1. You get the option to exclude Application from this Change Point detection activation. Go to Change Point detection and then go to Excluded Applications(Custom). Click on + button to Add an entry.

2.Tab Excluded Applications(SAP managed) provide the list of applications which are excluded from this Change Point Detection.

entry.title: SAP BTP AI Best Practices: Your Ultimate Guide for Building AI Solutions
entry.content:
As AI becomes a driving force in business innovation, developers need clear, proven patterns to turn ideas into enterprise-grade applications. That‚Äôs where SAP BTP AI Best Practices come in‚Äîa curated collection of implementation guidelines that connect powerful AI capabilities (like summarization, classification, and anomaly detection) with scalable, real-world solutions on SAP Business Technology Platform.

These BTP AI Best Practices are accessible from the Discovery Center, to get more details you can check SAP BTP Guidance Framework and the SAP BTP Guidance Framework - Introduction Post.

By turning advanced AI concepts into practical building blocks, SAP BTP AI Best Practices bring clarity, consistency, and momentum to your AI journey‚Äîso you can focus on creating impact, not reinventing the wheel. Our goal is to accelerate your development, reduce complexity, and unlock new possibilities with AI on SAP BTP.

To help developers navigate this landscape, the SAP BTP AI Best Practices website offers a central hub of essential resources‚Äîstructured around two complementary perspectives:

  • The functional view serves as a catalogue of frequently recurring AI use-case patterns. Each includes clear descriptions, hands-on examples, and thought-provoking questions to help you generate new ideas.
  • The technical view organizes best practices by AI domains, such as generative AI, and links them to their applicable capabilities. This structure helps you explore the underlying technologies and how they solve real-world business challenges.

Explore SAP BTP AI Best Practices

Below is a quick overview of the six best practices currently published, all of which focus on Generative AI use cases:

  • Access to Generative AI Models: Establishes a secure, flexible integration between SAP BTP and foundation models. It addresses how to manage model access, API calls, and infrastructure concerns while maintaining enterprise compliance.
  • Prompt Templating: Describes how to structure prompts dynamically using templates that incorporate user input and contextual business data. This ensures LLM responses remain relevant and tailored to specific enterprise use cases.
  • Data Masking: Shows how to protect sensitive or personal data when using external LLMs by applying masking techniques before sending prompts. This is essential for maintaining data privacy and regulatory compliance in enterprise applications.
  • Content Filtering: Focuses on ensuring safe, high-quality LLM outputs by filtering out inappropriate, irrelevant, or non-compliant responses before presenting them to end users.
  • Vector-based RAG: Embedding Pipeline: Covers the preprocessing steps needed to convert enterprise content into vector embeddings, including data chunking and storage strategies using SAP HANA Cloud‚Äôs vector engine.
  • Vector-based RAG: Query Pipeline: Explains how to retrieve and rank relevant vectorized content during a query, enabling Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) for more accurate, grounded, and context-aware LLM responses.

Building AI solutions in an enterprise context can be complex. Developers often face challenges like how to safely use external models, protect sensitive data, ensure response quality, and connect AI outputs to real business context. These best practices solve those issues with clear, repeatable approaches ‚Äî making it easier to build secure, relevant, and compliant AI features on SAP BTP.

These assets save time, reduce risk, and bring clarity to AI development. Instead of starting from scratch, teams can rely on proven patterns that work within the SAP BTP environment. They make it easier to go from idea to implementation, helping developers build smarter, faster, and with more confidence ‚Äî all while following enterprise standards.

You Might Also be Interested In

If you're looking to go deeper into AI development on SAP BTP, there are several resources to help you get started and stay current. From guided learning paths to hands-on missions and expert webinars, these materials complement the SAP BTP AI Best Practices and provide practical insights for your next project:

  1. SAP BTP AI Best Practices
  2. SAP Business AI Community
  3. SAP Developers Youtube channel

Feedback on SAP BTP AI Best Practices can be provided here.

Stay Tuned

This blog post is part of our ongoing series, Exploring the SAP BTP Guidance Framework, where we spotlight key resources that help you build smarter, faster, and with more confidence on SAP BTP. In the next post, we‚Äôll continue diving into different areas of the framework‚Äîso stay tuned and follow along as we explore more ways to turn ideas into enterprise-grade solutions.

entry.title: Cloud ALM - Solving Tips for detected exceptions raised for your supported solutions
entry.content:
Introduction

In this blog we would discuss recently made available Artificial Intelligence use cases - AI-assisted resolution of detected exceptions (Solving Tips) in Cloud ALM. This feature is available in Integration and Exception monitoring for exceptions raised for a supported solution.

To Understand more about Integration and Exception Monitoring (IEM) please refer to

https://support.sap.com/en/alm/sap-cloud-alm/operations/expert-portal/integration-monitoring.html 

Cloud ALM Expert Portal for operations is a one stop solution for all your Operations related asks in Cloud ALM. https://support.sap.com/en/alm/sap-cloud-alm/operations/expert-portal.html

  1. AI-assisted resolution of detected exceptions (Solving Tips) in Cloud ALM

Cloud ALM‚Äôs Exception Monitoring (EM) provides an artificial intelligence assisted feature to provide problem solving tips for the raised exception.

This AI feature is available for the all the users by default without any additional configurations.  Using it customers can easily see the SAP recommended notes for the exception and have the option to directly navigate to SAP for Me to read the complete possible solution by a single click, thus reducing time and effort to resolve the problem.

  1.  To access Problem solving tips follow the steps mentioned below.

Go to Integration and Exception monitoring in Operations area.

 

2.2 Select the required system to view the raised exceptions. Selected system would be available in the screen as highlighted below. 2.3Click on the Exceptions link, in this can it is for MyS4HANA_S4D system. Number of exceptions per category would be listed per category.

2.4 Select a category like (ABAP Application Log). All the exceptions raised are listed here.

2.5 Click on an exception. Details about the exception are listed here.

2.6 Solving tips are recommended for this particular exception in the Solving Tips Tab.

2.7 You can click on the recommended note to navigate to SAP for Me to read the note.

Additional Information.

You get the option to fine tune the result by providing additional keywords.

entry.title: Cloud Integration with Document AI
entry.content:
Introduction:

In this blog post, I will demonstrate how to connect Cloud Integration with Document AI. As a use case, let‚Äôs consider a scenario where a hospital registers a new patient, and the patient submits their previous prescription records. Using Document AI, we can extract relevant details such as past illnesses, allergies, and the patient‚Äôs blood group.

Document AI:

Step 1. As a pre-requisite, run a booster to activate Document AI in a trial account.  Reference link: Use Trial to Set Up Account for SAP Document AI and Get Service Key

Step 2. Create a custom schema as shown below.

Step 3. Upload sample prescriptions. Here, I have uploaded two prescriptions of a patient (merged into a single PDF). Please note that all the data is fictitious.

Step 4. Verify the extraction results, if required edit and then confirm.

For this example we get confidence percentage is 51%-80%. Please note, instant learning based on feedback is available on premium edition. Reference link: Instant Learning (Premium Edition)

Cloud Integration:

For the demo, I will send the PDF to Cloud Integration using an API testing tool. Cloud Integration will then forward it to Document AI, extract the results. 

The list of Document AI's APIs can be viewed using Swagger UI. The URL for swagger can be constructed from the Service key in the format: <tenantuiurl><swagger>

To call the Document AI API to post documents, use the below API.

The content modifier is used to set the options as below.

The groovy script is used to create the multipart/form-data format. The endpoint for the 1st call is <tenantuiurl><swagger>document/jobs

The response structure of the 1st call is shown below:

Retrieve the id and use the looping processing call option to get the extraction result once the job is completed.

Use the endpoint for 2nd call to get the extraction result:<tenantuiurl><swagger>document/jobs/<id>

The groovy script is used to retrieve the field values where the confidence level is more than 60%, and format the response.

Test the iFlow endpoint using API testing tool (as shown below).

Please note that all the data are fictitious.

Conclusion:

This blog post demonstrates a prototype that integrates Document AI for real life use cases along with Cloud Integration. 

Reference Link: SAP Document AI

entry.title: AI Applicant Screening in SAP SuccessFactors: A New Level of Support for Recruiters
entry.content:
AI Applicant Screening in SAP SuccessFactors: A New Level of Support for Recruiters

As someone who has spent years in Talent Acquisition, I've often found myself buried under stacks of resumes, trying to find that perfect candidate. It's repetitive work that can be exhausting. That's why I'm excited to share how SAP SuccessFactors' new AI-powered applicant screening is a game-changer for people like me in recruitment.

Simplifying the Screening Process

The AI feature in SAP SuccessFactors does more than just save time‚Äîit offers smart insights to help us zero in on the best candidates. The AI engine matches a candidate's skills to the job requirements not just by looking for exact matches but also by identifying related and transferable skills.

One of my favorite aspects of this tool is how it orders candidates, showing us who is the strongest match and who might be less relevant. Here‚Äôs how this benefits us as recruiters:

  • Efficient Screening: No more manually sifting through every resume.
  • Highlighting Strong Candidates: The best candidates rise to the top automatically.
  • Time-Saving: We‚Äôve seen up to 80% reduction in screening time, and a 25% faster time-to-fill rate thanks to this feature.

Visit here: https://discovery-center.cloud.sap/ai-feature/3ea4fec4-1f6d-4865-9459-54ac5b337641

How It Works‚ÄîThe Basics

Here's a simple breakdown of how the system operates:

  1. Job Creation: The AI extracts skills from your job description. You have the option to tweak it to your liking.
  2. Application Processing: Resumes are scanned for matching, related, and missing skills.
  3. Recruiter Dashboard: It presents matches clearly, showing candidates ranked by their overall fit with the role.
  4. Customizable Usage: You can enable the feature for specific positions whenever you think it's needed.

Visit here: https://help.sap.com/docs/successfactors-recruiting

Check Demo Video here: AI Applicant Screening

Why This Matters for Us

This technology is more than just helpful‚Äîit's transformative for recruiters:

  • Instant Shortlists: Quickly identify the right candidates without tedious manual effort.
  • Consistent Evaluation: Every candidate is assessed using the same criteria.
  • Improved Focus: We can spend more time engaging with candidates instead of doing repetitive, copy-paste tasks.
  • Informed Decisions: Thanks to transparent skill matching and ranking.

Part of a Broader AI Strategy

What's great is that this tool is part of a larger suite of AI offerings from SAP Business AI. Other features include:

  • Crafting better job descriptions
  • Generating interview questions tailored to individual roles
  • Recommending learning paths during onboarding

Visit here: https://learning.sap.com/learning-journeys/explore-sap-successfactors-solutions/leveraging-ai-capabilities-in-sap-successfactors

Final Thoughts

For talent acquisition professionals, this isn‚Äôt just another tech feature; it's a solution to many common hiring challenges. AI-assisted applicant screening in SAP SuccessFactors makes recruitment simpler and smarter, allowing us to focus on building more meaningful connections with the best candidates.

entry.title: AI-Assisted Chart Summary in SAP Analytics Cloud
entry.content:
We are thrilled to announce the General Availability of the AI-Assisted Chart Summary feature in SAP Analytics Cloud, add-in for Microsoft PowerPoint.
This new powerful capability is available as part of the Q3 2025 release.

 

What Is It?

The AI-Assisted Chart Summary leverages generative AI to automatically generate concise, human-readable summaries of SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) charts embedded in your PowerPoint presentations. Whether you're preparing for a meeting or sharing insights with stakeholders, this feature helps you communicate key takeaways faster and more clearly.

 

 

 

Benefits

  • Save Time: No more manually interpreting charts and writing manual summaries. AI-assisted chart summary delivers generated summary in seconds.
  • Enhance Clarity and boost accessibility: Summaries are crafted in natural language, making complex data accessible to everyone
  • Accelerate Decisions: By surfacing trends and key points instantly, users can act faster and smarter.
  • Stay Current: Summaries can be regenerated on demand to reflect any changes in the underlying chart data, ensuring your insights are always up to date.

 

How It Works

When working in SAC add-in for Microsoft PowerPoint, simply select a chart and click on ‚ÄúGenerate Summary‚Äù button. The generated text is inserted in the current slide as an editable comment, allowing you to tailor the message if needed. And if your data changes? Just regenerate the summary with a click‚Äîno need to start from scratch.

 

 

 

Licensing & Availability

This feature is part of the broader AI-Assisted Features suite in SAC and requires:

  • A valid SAC license (BI or Planning)
  • An AI Units SKU contract

AI Units are consumed as the feature is used. Pricing and consumption details are available via the SAP Business AI Catalog.

 

Thanks for your interest. We hope you will enjoy using this new capability and look forward to your feedback.

entry.title: SAP Build Work Zone Gets Even More Powerful with AI-Powered Capabilities
entry.content:
In today‚Äôs dynamic business environment, where speed and precision are critical to success, the ability to access, create, and act on information quickly has become a competitive advantage. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôre excited to introduce the latest AI-powered capabilities in SAP Build Work Zone, advanced edition. They are designed to help your organization unlock greater productivity and smarter collaboration.  

With the addition of AI-based text generation, summarization, and comment generation, you can now accelerate content creation, quickly distill key insights from lengthy documents, and actively engage with workspace content, all directly within your digital workplace. 

As SAP Build Work Zone continues to evolve into an intelligent digital workspace, these new features bring built-in intelligence that reduces manual effort, accelerates decision-making, and enhances the overall employee experience.  

 

AI promotional model 

To help you explore these new capabilities, we‚Äôre offering them under a promotional model (totally free of charge) until December 31, 2025. During this period, each global account is entitled to 100,000 AI requests per calendar month across all instances of SAP Build Work Zone, advanced edition. If the monthly quota is exceeded, users will receive a notification. The quota resets at the start of each month. 

After the promotional period ends, AI features will be available under a commercial model of SAP AI core. If you choose not to activate the commercial offering, the features will be automatically disabled. 

 

Availability 

The AI capabilities are powered by SAP AI Core and are available in the following data centers: 

  • AWS: Australia (Sydney), Brazil (S√£o Paulo), Europe (Frankfurt), Europe (Frankfurt EU Access), Japan (Tokyo), Singapore, US East (VA) 
  • Microsoft Azure: Australia (Sydney), Europe (Netherlands), US East (VA) 
  • Google Cloud: Australia Southeast (Sydney), Europe (Frankfurt), India (Mumbai), KSA (Dammam ‚Äì KSA Regulated Customers), US Central (IA) 

 

Enabling the AI features  

These AI-powered features can be enabled in the admin console. To get started, follow these simple steps: 

Step 1: Submit a Support Ticket 

Open a support ticket on component LOD-SF-SWZ requesting AI enablement for your subaccount. Make sure to include your environment details, which you can copy from the Admin Console > Overview screen using the Copy Info button. 

Step 2: Enable AI in the Admin Console 

Navigate to Administration Console > Feature Enablement > Features. Here you can select the AI features you want to activate. You‚Äôll be prompted to review and accept the terms and conditions before proceeding. 

 

Explore the new AI features 

Once enabled using the steps above, you‚Äôll find these capabilities integrated seamlessly into your workpages and workspace tools.  

1. AI Summarization 

This feature allows you to get the gist of long documents within seconds. AI Summarization helps you to condense large chunks of content such as wikis, blogs, workpages, and documents, into concise summaries.  

To summarize a content item, navigate to the workspace‚Äôs Content list from the navigation bar and select the document you want to process. When the content is open, click the Summarize button located at the top of the screen.  

The AI will then generate a summary that captures the key points of the original text.  

This feature supports content up to 100K words, making it a perfect tool for quickly grasping the essentials without having to read through long texts. 

2. AI Text Generation 

With this feature you can create compelling content with a few simple prompts. This feature helps you generate contextual text directly within your workpages. It is great for drafting introductions, elaborating ideas, or kickstarting any type of content. 

To use it, simply click on Add within a cell in your workspace and choose Generate Text from the dropdown menu.  

 

A dialog box will appear where you can enter your prompt. 

Based on this input, AI will generate relevant text, which may take a few moments to appear. Once the text is generated, you can further fine-tune the content to suit your style and requirements. Once you are satisfied you have the option to accept it, discard it, or generate a new version.  

3. AI Comment Generation 

Using this feature you can respond intelligently with AI-suggested comments. AI Comment Generation simplifies the process of engaging with content through contextual comments.  

To put this feature, open the Content list and select the specific content item you‚Äôd like to respond to. At the bottom of the screen, the AI icon can help you generate text with AI.  

Here you can enter a prompt or context.  

AI will then suggest relevant comment options for you to accept, discard or retry.

You can use this feature to contribute to discussions, provide feedback, or interact with colleagues. The same text generation experience is available when writing a news feed as well.

***** 

These AI-powered enhancements are just the beginning. At SAP, we're committed to helping you work more intelligently, engage more effectively, and innovate faster. Stay tuned as we continue to expand the AI capabilities in SAP Build Work Zone, empowering your teams like never before. 

 

Learn more: 

‚û§ SAP Build Work Zone on: sap.com / SAP Community

‚û§ SAP Application Development and Automation Community Group

‚û§ Joule is available in SAP Build Work Zone, standard edition

entry.title: AI Copilots and the External Workforce: Reimaging the Future with Conversational Intelligence
entry.content:
In today‚Äôs fast-moving business landscape, where speed determines market leadership, the way organizations manage external talent is under intense scrutiny. Procurement and HR leaders are expected to deliver more‚Äîfaster, smarter, and with greater accountability‚Äîbut they‚Äôre often constrained by outdated, manual workflows that lag the pace of change. 

The rise of hybrid work, the surge in contingent labor, and the growing complexity of services procurement have created a perfect storm of operational friction. As pressure mounts to optimize spend, ensure compliance, and secure the right talent at the right time, the disconnect between executive expectations and system capabilities becomes increasingly clear ‚Äî tools in place often deliver fragmentation, delays, and administrative burden. It‚Äôs no longer enough to simply digitize workflows. Executives are demanding real-time visibility, streamlined execution, and actionable insights.  

The current mandate is shifting from basic automation to intelligent orchestration powered by AI and copilots. Enterprise systems are no longer just expected to process tasks‚Äîthey must evolve to anticipate user needs, guide decision-making, and unlock capacity at scale. Reflecting this shift, 44% of executives identify AI strategy and integration as a top priority for procurement teams over the next 12‚Äì18 months. 

As a leader in external workforce, SAP Fieldglass has taken a disciplined, strategic approach to artificial intelligence‚Äîone that prioritizes trust, transparency, and tangible business value. Focusing on deeply and seamlessly embedding it in the systems that power external workforce management. Delivering intelligence that understands the complexity of enterprise operations, respects data integrity, and scales with confidence. SAP Fieldglass‚Äôs AI is helping businesses run better by turning data into decisions, and decisions into outcomes. That‚Äôs what makes its approach essential for organisations navigating transformation at scale.  

 Joule and the Power of GenAI: Embedded Intelligence for Every Workflow 

The launch of Joule, SAP‚Äôs copilot, within SAP Fieldglass marks a transformative moment for organizations seeking to elevate their contingent labor and services procurement strategies. Joule is not just another tool‚Äîit‚Äôs a strategic enabler that redefines how practitioners interact with data, make decisions, and drive operational excellence. 

Joule introduces a conversational interface that allows users to interact with SAP Fieldglass in a natural, intuitive way. By shifting from manual navigation to intelligent dialogue executives and managers can now receive assistance with everyday tedious tasks ‚Äì including multiple search and navigation enhancements, as well as assistance in the creation of job postings and SOWs ‚Äì within contingent and Statement of Work (SOW) workflows, simply by engaging through a conversational interface. 

For users focused on speed and scale, Joule delivers a powerful suite of capabilities that streamline decision-making and execution: 

  • It guides users to best-fit templates and intelligently pre-fills key fields such as start dates. 
  • It retrieves complex reports‚Äîlike quarterly budget and spend, worker headcount, and job postings‚Äîwith ease. 
  • It quickly surfaces relevant help information from the SAP Help Portal site and actionable insights that would otherwise take hours to uncover. 

Together, these capabilities dramatically reduce time-to-action, minimize manual errors, accelerate the learning curve, and improve the overall user experience. Joule also enhances visibility and precision in workforce planning, empowering users to make informed decisions around vendor spend, talent allocation, and compliance risks. 

Joule is integrated directly into SAP Fieldglass, so it eliminates the need to toggle between systems or undergo extensive training, allowing teams to focus on outcomes rather than processes. This frictionless experience is particularly appealing to executives who value simplicity and efficiency in enterprise technology. 

Security and scalability are foundational to Joule‚Äôs design. Built within SAP‚Äôs trusted ecosystem, it adheres to rigorous governance standards, ensuring that innovation does not compromise compliance or unconscious bias. For organizations operating across geographies and industries, this means they can deploy Joule with confidence, knowing it meets the highest standards of data protection and operational integrity. 

SAP Fieldglass AI journey 

SAP Fieldglass has been at the forefront of integrating machine learning and artificial intelligence into its solutions for years. From intelligent resume assessments and skill-based candidate matching to automated job description creation, translation, and even SOW generation, SAP has consistently delivered AI-driven capabilities that enhance talent management and procurement processes. These innovations reflect a broader, ongoing commitment to embedding intelligence across the SAP ecosystem‚Äîan evolution that continues with the integration of Joule. 

SAP Fieldglass SOW Document AI is an intelligent document processing solution that streamlines the management of Statement of Work (SOW) documents within the SAP Fieldglass platform. Leveraging artificial intelligence and machine learning, it automates the extraction, classification, and validation of key data from SOW PDFs, such as job roles, deliverables, durations, and financial terms. This reduces manual effort, minimizes errors, and accelerates the onboarding and management of external workforce engagements. By integrating seamlessly with the Fieldglass ecosystem, SOW Document AI enhances compliance, improves data accuracy, and helps organizations make faster, more informed decisions when managing services procurement. 

In conclusion 

Looking ahead, Joule will include deeper analytics and expanded use cases across the SAP Business AI portfolio. This evolution will further empower leaders to harness AI in ways that are strategic, scalable, and deeply aligned with their organizational priorities.  

For executives ready to lead this transformation, Joule offers a unique opportunity to reimagine how work gets done. It‚Äôs not just about automation‚Äîit‚Äôs about unlocking new levels of insight, speed, and strategic control.  

SAP helps bring simplicity and clarity to all types of spending from all across a company. SAP invites customers and partners to take part in the transformation, shaping the future of intelligent workforce management together, so that you can take a step toward a smarter, more agile workforce. 

Interested to learn more or activate Joule in your environment?  

Reach out to your an SAP representative or Contact us today‚ÄØ 

Please refer to the following screenshots for more details of the use cases  

1) Joule - Job Posting Template Selection

2) Joule - Report Search and Execution

3) Joule - Help Retrieval

entry.title: SAP Business AI ‚Äì Driving the Next Wave of Enterprise Innovation
entry.content:
Why It Matters

AI is no longer a distant concept‚Äîit‚Äôs transforming how businesses operate today. Generative AI alone is projected to add up to $4.4 trillion in global productivity within the next five years. For SAP customers, who generate 87% of the world‚Äôs commerce, the impact of embedding AI directly into core business processes is both immediate and profound.

Key Highlights:

Joule ‚Äì The AI Copilot

  • Acts as SAP‚Äôs unified front end, enabling users to work in natural language.

  • Delivers context-aware insights, transaction execution, and navigation across SAP apps.

  • Boosts efficiency by up to 80% for employees.

  • Coordinates specialized AI agents for complex tasks (e.g., dispute resolution, sustainability planning).

  • Integrates with Microsoft Copilot for Office 365 for seamless cross-platform experiences.

Embedded AI ‚Äì Innovation at Scale

  • AI features are built directly into SAP‚Äôs cloud solutions (ERP, Supply Chain, HCM, CRM, Procurement, etc.).

  • Use cases already improving business outcomes:

    • Henkel ‚Üí Faster, data-driven decisions with AI in SAP Analytics Cloud.

    • FC Bayern Munich ‚Üí Accelerated recruiting with generative AI in SAP SuccessFactors.

    • Gibson ‚Üí Boosted email revenue by 50% through AI-powered customer engagement.

  • Over 100+ new AI features released in 2024, with continuous quarterly rollouts.

AI Foundation ‚Äì Building Custom Solutions

  • Part of SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP).

  • Provides developers with reusable AI services, lifecycle management, and access to leading LLMs (OpenAI, Google, AWS, Meta, etc.).

  • Offers deep integration with SAP HANA Cloud Vector Engine and SAP Knowledge Graph for contextualized business data.

  • Enables low-data AI innovation, such as invoice due date predictions or sales order auto-filling .

Responsible AI at SAP

  • Commitment to ethics, privacy, and security:

    • No partner or third-party models are trained on customer data.

    • AI ethics embedded in governance via SAP‚Äôs AI Ethics Steering Committee.

    • Guardrails against misuse, bias, and security risks.

  • Alignment with UNESCO AI ethics standards and EU AI Act compliance .

SAP‚Äôs vision is AI-first and suite-first:

  • AI copilots like Joule will become hyper-personalized.

  • More AI-driven automation across finance, HR, supply chain, and sustainability.

The future is already here. With SAP Business AI, organizations can run better, innovate faster, and empower people to focus on what truly matters.

Explore more:

  • SAP Business AI Feature Catalog

  • Learning Journeys

entry.title: SAP Platform and Data Summit 2025: Unlock the Future of Innovation | Register Now
entry.content:
SAP Platform and Data Summit 2025: Unlock the Future of Innovation with SAP Business Technology Platform and SAP Business Data Cloud | Register Now

Hello, SAP Community!

My name is Joanne Koh-Stewart, and I'm Director of Product Marketing for SAP Business Technology Platform. As we navigate an era where enterprise data management isn't just an asset‚Äîit's the foundation of every strategic decision‚Äîbusiness leaders face an unprecedented challenge: How do you transform mountains of information into meaningful competitive advantage?

According to recent IDC research, organizations that successfully harness the power of SAP Business Technology Platform with business applications reported achieving annual benefits worth $13.88 million per organization on average. Yet, many businesses find themselves drowning in data complexity, struggling to connect the dots between various business applications, processes, and other IT investments for tangible business outcomes.

That's precisely why I'm thrilled to invite you to the SAP Platform and Data Summit 2025‚Äîan exclusive gathering designed for pioneering business leaders and IT experts ready to unlock the transformative power of intelligent data strategies with SAP Business Technology Platform and SAP Business Data Cloud.

 

The Reality Check: Where Most Organizations Stand Today

Picture this scenario that's playing out in boardrooms across industries. Your organization has invested millions in digital transformation initiatives. You've implemented many applications required for your business, collected vast amounts of data, and are now hopefully looking into utilizing various AI tools. Yet when you want to optimize business processes, increase sales, engage customers, and elevate employee experience, you‚Äôre lost on where to start.

Sound familiar? The challenge isn't technology‚Äîit's the strategic alignment of SAP Business Technology Platform and SAP Business Data Cloud with real business objectives. You're sitting on a goldmine of data, but the path to extracting value feels fragmented across different systems, departments, and decision-making processes.

The key lies in creating an intelligent, unified ecosystem where your SAP and non-SAP data, applications, and AI capabilities work in harmony. SAP BTP, coupled with SAP BDC and SAP Business AI, doesn't just solve technical challenges‚Äîit fundamentally reshapes how your organization thinks, learns, and competes in the market.

 

What Makes This Summit Different: Customer-Led Innovation

Unlike typical vendor conferences, the SAP Platform and Data Summit puts customer success stories at the center. You'll hear directly from IT decision-makers and business leaders who have navigated similar challenges you're facing today. These aren't theoretical case studies‚Äîthey're battle-tested strategies with real business value.

The two-day format is intentionally designed for deep engagement. Day 1 focuses on hearing from customers and partners‚Äô success stories, while Day 2 dives into collaborative workshops to learn and ideate. You'll leave not just with inspiration, but with concrete next steps tailored to your organization's unique digital transformation journey.

 

Four Essential Topic Tracks You'll Explore at the Summit

On Day 2, dedicated tracks are offered to address the most pressing challenges facing organizations today in a workshop setting. Each track combines strategic insights with practical implementation guidance from customers who have successfully navigated these transformations.


BTP for Clean Core
You: Your organization is managing a complex landscape of customizations that make system upgrades challenging and expensive. Every enhancement seems to create technical debt, and you're concerned about maintaining agility while preserving critical business functionality.
The Solution: Learn how SAP BTP enables you to extend SAP applications without compromising your core system integrity. Through customer success stories, you'll discover how organizations are leveraging the clean core principles to innovate rapidly while maintaining upgrade readiness and reducing long-term maintenance costs.

BUILD-ing AI Applications & Extensions
You: Your business needs and processes aren't always met by standard applications, but custom development is time-consuming and resource-intensive. Meanwhile, your development teams are under pressure to deliver solutions faster while maintaining quality, security, and scalability.
The Solution: Explore how SAP Build empowers both professional developers and business users to create applications and extensions rapidly. See real examples of organizations using low-code development to bridge capability gaps, automate processes, and create tailored user experiences that drive business value.

AI & Joule
You: Despite the industry's significant importance and heavy investment in AI initiatives, your organizations struggle to move beyond pilot projects to enterprise-scale implementations that deliver measurable business impact.
The Solution: Discover how SAP Business AI and Joule are revolutionizing business processes across industries. Through customer presentations, you'll witness how AI is being utilized to improve business workflows, enhance decision-making, automate complex tasks, and provide intelligent insights that drive strategic outcomes.

Business Data Cloud
You: Your organization has access to vast amounts of data from different systems, but each source speaks a different "language." Without a unified semantic model, your data remains fragmented and difficult to interpret, limiting your ability to leverage advanced analytics and planning capabilities that could transform your business performance.
The Solution: Learn how SAP Business Data Cloud harmonizes heterogeneous data into a coherent, business-ready semantic model with SAP Datasphere. Explore customer examples of organizations that have transformed disconnected data into actionable insights, enabling sophisticated analytics, predictive planning, and strategic decision-making across the enterprise with SAP Analytics Cloud.

 

Register Now: Space is Limited (and FREE!)

The Summit isn't just about learning new technologies‚Äîit's about positioning your organization to lead in the data-driven economy that's already here.

Whether you're at the beginning of your SAP journey or looking to maximize existing investments, this Summit will provide the strategic clarity, practical insights, and professional connections to accelerate your transformation.

Register now and join the exclusive community of leaders who are turning data complexity into competitive simplicity.

 

Let's Connect

I'll be attending the Summit in Chicago this year, and I look forward to connecting with fellow transformation leaders! Come prepared with your toughest platform and data challenges‚Äîthis is your opportunity to collaborate with peers who are solving similar problems and SAP experts who can provide immediate guidance.

Now let's hear from you:

  • What's your biggest obstacle in scaling your platform and data initiatives?

entry.title: The Complete Joule Studio Resource Hub: Everything You Need to Get Started
entry.content:
Access Joule Studio from the SAP Build Lobby.

 

Joule Studio, the latest capability in SAP Build, is a low-code/no-code environment designed for creating, deploying, and managing custom Joule agents and skills. These agents and skills, which are deeply grounded in business data, allow developers to optimize rule-based and dynamic workflows and drive precise business outcomes. Joule Studio offers an open and extensible framework to infuse agentic intelligence into business workflows that span across SAP and non-SAP systems.  

Since July, Joule Studio is generally available (GA) with the skill builder capability. This blog is your practical guide that compiles all the resources you need to understand the product and get started on building agentic AI in a structured way.   

Here‚Äôs a recommended step-by-step approach: 

  • Start with overview resources such as announcements and short videos to gain conceptual clarity 
  • Deepen your understanding with technical blogs and guided experiences 
  • Move to structured courses and other learning materials for hands-on experience. 
  • Try the live product 

 

Getting introduced 

Every product journey starts with a curiosity - what is the product, and why should I care? This phase is all about getting conceptual understanding about Joule Studio and its capabilities:   

  • Joule Studio Announcement Blog ‚Äì Read the official announcement on what is being released and when 
  • Joule Studio Product Video ‚Äì Two minutes overview of Joule Studio, showcasing its capabilities and unique value in enabling skills and agents for workflows across SAP and non-SAP systems 
  • Joule Studio: custom Joule skills GA blog - Read the GA announcement for the skill builder. Understand characteristics and step-to-step process for building a skill 
  • On-Demand Webinar ‚Äì Watch the on-demand webinar to go a little deeper, understand key agentic AI use cases, and get a sneak peek at product capabilities: skill builder and agent builder with a demo  

 

Seeing Joule Studio in action 

Once you know what Joule Studio does, the next step is to see it in action. Watching real demos and guided experiences helps you visualize where it fits into everyday business tasks and what it can achieve: 

  • Guided Product Tour ‚Äì Take a guided tour of Joule Studio to explore how you can build AI agents and Joule Skills with drag and drop simplicity to achieve specific business outcomes 
  • Interactive Value Journey: Skill Builder ‚Äì See how to configure a Joule skill to connect SAP SuccessFactors with a third-party payroll system 
  • Interactive Value Journey: Agent Builder Vision ‚Äì Design agents that plan, adapt, and act autonomously 
  • Custom Joule skill creation ‚Äì demo video - Learn how to create a Joule skill to create an ID badge in a third-party system after a preliminary check in an SAP system 
  • Learning Journey: Introducing Joule Studio in SAP Build ‚Äì learning course on Joule Studio and its capabilities 

 

Explore the product hands on 

 Ready to dig in? This phase is all about experiencing the product hands on. Here‚Äôs where you start experimenting, take on learning missions, and build skills at your own pace: 

  • Discovery Center Mission ‚Äì Best practices for connecting systems and scaling your Joule skills 
  • Developer Tutorial: Build Your First Joule Skill ‚Äì Deploy your first custom Joule skill that retrieves employee information from one system and uses that information in another system 

 

Get started  

This phase provides you essential documentation to help you set up and get started with Joule Studio: 

  • Partner spotlights - before you get started on your own use case, read about real world Agentic AI use cases and their implementation by our partners: Redwood, Pricefx, LeverX, and Sovanta  
  • How to get started blog - understand the step-to-step process: prerequisites, commercial details, and technical setup 
  • FAQ blog - answers to your frequently asked questions  
  • Technical Set up guide - technical set up needed to access Joule Studio within SAP Build 

 

Closing remarks

With this organized set of resources, you have everything you need - from understanding the product to getting fully set up. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or advanced developer, these materials are designed to support you and answer your questions at every step. We can't wait to hear what you build with Joule Studio in SAP Build!
